Package client.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AlreadyOccupiedExcepton
    prevents a player from building a road where another road exists.
    DisconnectException
    this exception is for when the user loses their internet connection
    GameOverException
    Prevents player action after game is over
    InsufficientResourcesException
    stops a player from buying something without having the resources necessary to do so.
    InvalidModelException
    thrown when the JSON translated model is invalid.
    InvalidResourceTradeException
    thrown when player offers a resource they don't have or tries an invalid trade with the bank.
    NotYourTurnException
    stops a player from acting on another players turn.
    OutOfBoundsException
    prevents an out of bounds edge location from being used.
    ResourceEmptyException
    thrown when player tries to get a resouce from the bank that the bank doesn't have.
    VicinityException
    prevents a player from building a settlement too close to another settlement.
